The professional biographies of Stephen: Kevin Owens do not mention any affiliation with Dominion Voting Systems.
The claim is based on misleading screens: as people are sharing a common surname.
Valerie Biden Owens: the sister and campaign manager of President-elect Joe Biden, does not have a son named Stephen Owens. Stephen Owens, who is a co-founder of Staple Street Capital, the investment firm that owns a stake in Dominion, has no relation to the Biden family.
